mapper.select: select * from clubs where club_no in (select club_no from member_dips group by club_no having count(*) > 1 order by club_no desc ) limit 4
select * from clubs order by club_regdate desc limit 4;
select * from clubs where club_no in ( select club_no from ( select club_no from club_members group by club_no having count(*) > 1 order by count(*) desc limit 4) as a ) order by club_regdate desc
